Citi Bikes

New York's Bike Sharing Program

Data Source: Citi Bike System Data

About the Program: Citi Bike's Wikipedia Page


Start Station Popularity

Top Starting Station: Grove St Path. 16,000 trips started here.

Stations in the downtown area near the water appear to be more popular starting points.

See Full Size Image

Ending Station Popularity

Top Ending Station: Grove St Path. 19,000 trips ended here.

Compared to starting points, more trips appear to end further away from the water.

See Full Size Image

Length of Trip by Starting Station

Top Station by Length of Ride: Jackson Square

See Full Size Image

Ride Length by Age

Overall trendline does not show any substantial affect on ride length by age. Rider IDs were not factored into this analysis. Peaks at age 50 and 22 may be caused by individual riders.

See Full Size Image

Rides by Day of the Week

More rides occured on Wednesday than any other day of the week.

See Full Size Image

Rides by Month

There has been a steady increase in the number of rides per month from February through March.

See Full Size Image
